thread.title: Woman turns parents' home into the coolest haunted house ever
thread.title_full: Woman turns parents' home into the coolest haunted house ever - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Woman turns parents' home into the coolest haunted house ever
text:
The internet is full of superlatives, but this is actually the coolest haunted house ever.
Artist and photographer Christine McConnell was recently watching the movie 'Monster House' when she realized her parents' Southern California home had the perfect vibe to become a sentient haunted house.
McConnell spent four 12-hour days transforming the home. The eyes and fangs were made of carefully painted foam-core boards. Jack o'lanterns, giant spiders and a little mood lighting completed the look.
"Everyone has loved it so far," McConnell said. "Kids wanted to take their picture with the house while I was working on it! Tons of people driving by were stopping to take pictures. I've decorated their house before and people have always loved it, but it never got this much of a reaction."
If you're feeling sheepish about the cotton wool cobwebs outside your house, it might reassure you to know that McConnell is occupationally creative. She's already well-known for her stunning horror-themed baked goods and her first cookbook is due out soon .
For more of McConnell's work, you can visit her Instagram .
